kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

test.name: Register a new account on Future Skill

kw.name: Step 1: Navigate to Future Skill website
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.
เปิดเว็บไซต์ Future Skill

kw.name: Step 2: Click "สมัครสมาชิก" button
Wait until element is ready then click element
Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//button[text()="สมัครสมาชิก"]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.arg: xpath=//button[text()="สมัครสมาชิก"]

kw.doc: คลิกปุ่ม "สมัครสมาชิก" บนหน้าแรกของ Future Skill

kw.name: Step 3: Fill out registration form
Wait until element is ready then input text
Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
กรอกข้อมูลสมัครสมาชิก เช่น อีเมล รหัสผ่าน ชื่อ นามสกุล และเบอร์โทรศัพท์

kw.name: Step 4: Submit registration form
Wait until element is ready then click element
Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//button[text()="สมัครสมาชิก"]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.arg: xpath=//button[text()="สมัครสมาชิก"]

kw.doc: คลิกปุ่ม "สมัครสมาชิก" เพื่อส่งข้อมูล

kw.name: Step 5: Verify OTP page message
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'ระบบได้ส่งรหัส OTP ไปยังเบอร์โทรศัพท์' into text field 'xpath=//input[@name='otpCode']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.arg: ระบบได้ส่งรหัส OTP ไปยังเบอร์โทรศัพท์
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
ตรวจสอบข้อความว่าระบบได้ส่ง OTP ไปยังเบอร์โทรศัพท์
